DOC.brief_summary: To determine the safety and efficacy of Fexofenadine (TelfastÂ®) 30mg pediatric tablets on Filipino children aged 6 to 11 for the relief of symptoms associated with perennial and intermittent allergic rhinitis.
DOC.brief_title: Fexofenadine Study On Filipino Children for The Relief of Perennial And Intermittent Allergic Rhinitis
DOC.criteria: Children who manifest allergic rhinitis symptoms such as sneezing, rhinorrhea, itchy nose/palate/throat and/or itchy/watery/red eyes.
